title: Beef carpaccio with fried capers and mustard mayo
description: Melt-in-the-mouth beef works perfectly with a tangy dressing and salty capers.
ingredients: 1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, plus extra for drizzling
2 tbsp finely chopped fresh flatleaf parsley
a few shavings Parmesan (use a vegetable peeler to make these)
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
